case.title: Seeking Single, Black Men...
case.text:
** Summer Offer Special!**
Hey Guys,
I'm a Real Matchmaker who's looking to help single, black men 35-45 years of age find love. I have 3 free spots available, if you'd like to join my service for a 30 day trial period- and be matched up with some wonderful women.
So if you're looking to find a smart, attractive, single, African-American woman, then email me today!
This offer will expire as soon as all 3 remaining slots are taken. Make sure you reserve your membership today!
~Serious Replies Only~
